block.help: creates a textfield with the settings provided by you under this block and assign it a name.

block.spec: set width of the text box to %0 [c:bear]
block.help: sets the width of the textfield (NOTE: Must be placed inside the wrapper block 'let this text box name be') .

block.spec: set height of the text box to %0 [c:bear]
block.help: sets the height of the textfield (NOTE: Must be placed inside the wrapper block 'let this text box name be') .

block.spec: set the maximum number of characters to %0 (OPTIONAL) [c:bear]
block.help: sets the maximum number of characters that can be typed in the textfield , type 0 if unlimited.(NOTE: Must be placed inside the wrapper block 'let this text box name be') .
Sets the size of the text that will be typed.(NOTE: Must be placed inside the wrapper block 'let this text box name be') .
Sets the color of the text that will be typed.(NOTE: Must be placed inside the wrapper block 'let this text box name be') .
Sets the font of the text that will be typed.(NOTE: Must be placed inside the wrapper block 'let this text box name be') .
set the typing mode of characters. (NOTE: Must be placed inside the wrapper block 'let this text box name be') .
set the pretyped text.(NOTE: Must be placed inside the wrapper block 'let this text box name be') .

block.spec: get text of textfield of name: %0 [i:font]
block.help: get the text of the textfield by the name which you assigned to it earlier.

block.spec: create box at with X: %0 and Y: %1 [c:bear] [c:last]
block.help: creates the box at the cordinates .(NOTE: Must be placed inside the wrapper block 'let this text box name be') (NOTE: THIS SHOULD BE IN THE LAST OF THE WRAPPER BLOCK)

block.spec: remove the text box of name: %0 [c:del]
block.help: removes the box of the name.
